NgTableParams

Parameters manager for ngTable

Methods

  • count(count);

    If parameter count not set return current count per page else set count per page

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    count string

    Count per number

    Returns

    ObjectNumber

    Count per page or this

  • filter(filter);

    If 'filter' parameter not set return current filter else set current filter

    Note: when assigning a new filter, page will be set to 1

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    filter ObjectBoolean

    'object': new filter to assign or 'true': to return the current filter minus any insignificant values (null, undefined and empty string); or 'falsey': to return the current filter "as is"

    Returns

    Object

    Current filter or this

  • generatePagesArray(currentPage, totalItems, pageSize, maxBlocks);

    Generate array of pages

    When no arguments supplied, the current parameter state of this NgTableParams instance will be used

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    currentPage boolean

    which page must be active
    totalItems boolean

    Total quantity of items
    pageSize boolean

    Quantity of items on page
    maxBlocks number

    Quantity of blocks for pagination

    Returns

    Array

    Array of pages

  • hasErrorState();

    Return true when an attempt to reload the current parameter values have resulted in a failure

    This method will continue to return true until the reload is successfully called or when the parameter values have changed

  • hasFilter();

    Determines if NgTableParams#filter has significant filter value(s) (any value except null, undefined, or empty string)

    Returns

    Boolean

    true when NgTableParams#filter has at least one significant field value

  • hasFilterChanges();

    Return true when a change to NgTableParams.filtersrequire the reload method to be run so as to ensure the data presented to the user reflects these filters

  • isDataReloadRequired();

    Return true when a change to this NgTableParams instance should require the reload method to be run so as to ensure the data presented to the user reflects the NgTableParams

  • isSortBy(field, direction);

    Checks sort field

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    field string

    Field name
    direction string

    Optional direction of sorting ('asc' or 'desc')

    Returns

    Array

    Return true if field sorted by direction

  • orderBy();

    Return object of sorting parameters for angular filter

    Returns

    Array

    Array like: [ '-name', '+age' ]

  • page(page);

    If parameter page not set return current page else set current page

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    page string

    Page number

    Returns

    ObjectNumber

    Current page or this

  • parameters(newParameters, parseParamsFromUrl);

    Set new parameters or get current parameters

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    newParameters string

    New parameters
    parseParamsFromUrl string

    Flag if parse parameters like in url

    Returns

    Object

    Current parameters or this

  • reload();

    Reload table data

  • settings(newSettings);

    Set new settings for table

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    newSettings string

    New settings or undefined

    Returns

    Object

    Current settings or this

  • sorting(sorting);

    If 'sorting' parameter is not set, return current sorting. Otherwise set current sorting.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    sorting string

    New sorting

    Returns

    Object

    Current sorting or this

  • total(total);

    If parameter total not set return current quantity else set quantity

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    total string

    Total quantity of items

    Returns

    ObjectNumber

    Current page or this

  • url(asString);

    Return groups for table grouping

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    asString boolean

    flag indicates return array of string or object

    Returns

    Array

    If asString = true will be return array of url string parameters else key-value object
